MAIN_MESSAGE: This is a message for customers in the EH27 postcode area of Kirknewton. It has been necessary for our engineers to carry out an emergency shutdown at 1.00pm due to an overhead line fault near to Kirknewton house and this may affect the supply to your property. We will work to get your power back on as quickly and as safely as possible by 4.00pm. We will update this message if this information changes. We apologise for the inconvenience and thank you for your patience. This message was updated at 12:32pm on Wednesday, 24 February 2021
